channel.title: Page-rsses on DevOps Montreal
channel.description: Recent content in Page-rsses on DevOps Montreal

item.title: About
item.description:
DevOps Montréal explores the intersection of software development and systems operations, in an era of agile development, cloud computing and automation. We hold monthly meetings since 2011 around the DevOps movement, more particularly on products, technologies and methodologies.

These meetings are generally composed of presentations, demos and discussions. We invite everyone interested in the subject to join us, whether you are a neophyte or an expert.

Organizers

  • Benoit Caron
  • Pierre-Luc Dion
  • Simon Plourde
  • James

A special thanks to former organizers:

  • Mathieu Martin
  • François Lapierre Messier

item.title: Contact Us
item.description:
You can reach the organizers by email at the address devops-montreal-admin@googlegroups.com.

Subscribe to our monthly newsletter to be notified of upcoming events. We’ll never share your information, and you can unsubscribe with a single click at any time.

Interact with the community in our mailing list to suggest ideas, participate in technical discussions and find or post a job.

Follow us on Twitter for meeting announcements and news about the community.

item.title: Present
item.description:
We are always looking for people interested in presenting talks of 5, 15 or 30 minutes at the upcoming events. Whether you are a developer, system administrator, architect, scrum master or other, we want to hear from you!

Share your knowledge, discoveries, stories of great success and worthy failures on topics around the DevOps universe. You can present in English or French and no need to be a world leader in the subject.

Submit your idea by writing to us.
